subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: A home run by Brian McCann provided the go-ahead run against the Rays. It was the only ball to leave the yard, meaning Alex Rodriguez’s pursuit of career home run No. 660 will endure.
snippet: A home run by Brian McCann provided the go-ahead run against the Rays. It was the only ball to leave the yard, meaning Alex Rodriguez’s pursuit of career home run No. 660 will endure.
